definition: submit to me and prosper, or oppose me and perish
pinyin: shun4 wo3 zhe3 chang1 ni4 wo3 zhe3 wang2

definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
